parameters.name: ArrayDataIn
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of skipped components VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

title: ILocalLinearPatternFeatureData.ISetSkippedItemArray
description: Sets the skipped components in this linear component pattern feature.
signature:
void ISetSkippedItemArray( 
   System.Int32
FeatCount
,
   ref System.Int32
ArrayDataIn
)

parameters.name: ArrayDataIn
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of skipped components VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

remarks:
ArrayDataIn is 0-based. If you skip the 3rd and 5th components in the pattern, the array looks like ArrayDataIn[0] = 3 and ArrayDataIn[1] = 5.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
